heading: HOLIDAY SHOPPING AT BEVERLY CENTER
text:
As everyone knows, the holiday season can sometimes be super stressful when it comes to shopping and finding the perfect gift for everyone. This year, I was stoked to get an early start on my holiday shopping at The Beverly Center, and mayyy have even picked up a few things for myself!

Sweater: Topman Black Turtle Neck Sweater
Jeans: Abercrombie & Fitch Skinny Jeans in Light Wash
Shoes: Stubbs & Wootton

text:
I know, I am majorly back logged on blog posts! Excited to have some down time post-holidays to get a bunch of my recent looks posted, starting with this one which was literally my last time wearing shorts this season. Too cold here in LA now!

heading: STRIPES + WHITE
text:
Love the fresh, clean feeling of an all white ensemble, topped off with a blackout pair of aviators. For this outfit, I paired my fave white skinny denim with a lightweight striped shirt, layered over a classic white crew neck.

Sunglasses: Vintage
Shirt: Boohoo Man Long Sleeve Stripe Shirt
Jeans: Mott & Bow Mercer in Jet Stream White
Shoes: Converse All Star Low Tops in Optical White
XXZT

heading: EASY LIKE SUNDAY MORNING
text:
On Sunday mornings, I usually like to ease into the last day of the weekend over a cup of coffee and sometimes a walk around the neighborhood. I love outfits that fuse comfort with style, and this particular look is a great example of that. Cozy sweats are made cool when paired with a leather jacket and aviators. Details below! How do you like to spend your Sunday mornings?



Sunglasses: MIKOH HNL Sunglasses

Jacket: All Saints Kushiro Leather Biker Jacket

Sweatpants: H&M Sweatpants

Shoes: Adidas Adilette Slides



XXZT

heading: MR. PORTER HOLIDAY GIFT GUIDE
text:
It's hard to believe that the holiday season is upon us, this year seemed to zoom by in a flash! I'm personally gearing up to spend Thanksgiving with my family here in LA, and cook up my signature spicy cornbread stuffing which I bring to the dinner table every year.

With the holidays quick to follow, wanted to share a little gift guide I've put together from one of my go-to shopping destinations, Mr. Porter.

A mix of pieces that are currently on my outfit lust list, combined with some great giftable items, make for an assortment that is sure to please every guy on your list.

1. Saint Laurent Leather Biker Jacket - this is what motorcycle jacket dreams are made of.
2. Saint Laurent Skinny Fit Distressed Denim - love the vintage, destroyed look of this killer pair of denim.
3. Gucci Leather Trimmed Canvas Espadrilles - it's no secret that I love me a pair of espadrilles, and the tiger motif on these bad boys seals the deal.
4. Baxter of California Night Cream AHA - this is my go-to night cream and is a great gift for a guy who may be a bit trepidatious about a nighttime skincare regime!
5. Tom Ford Oud Wood Eau De Parfum - giving cologne as a gift can oftentimes mean for risky business, as scents are so personal. However, this exotic, masculine fragrance is a pretty safe bet.
6. Diptyque Feu de Bois Candle - an all time favorite candle, Feu de Bois is reminiscent of the aroma from a crackling fire. Perfect for cold nights and an incredible, easy gift.
7. Ray-Ban Clubmaster in Black/Gold - as you've most likely noticed, I wear these shades constantly. They are a classic, to put it plainly. These frames are flattering on so many face shapes, and make for a timeless, stylish gift.
8. Derek Rose Duke Herringbone Cashmere Robe - if there's ever a question of "what to get for the man who has everything" - why not treat him to a cashmere robe? Category is: OPULENCE!

XXZT

heading: HONOLULU BOMBER
text:
Aloha! Here's to this killer cool Honolulu satin bomber jacket. Even when the autumn descends and the temps chill down, I still like to bring a certain splash of tropical style to my look. Otherwise, it would just be a plain pair of black skinny jeans and a white t-shirt - not that there's anything wrong with that ;)

Jacket: Topman Bomber Jacket (Similar)
T-Shirt: J.Crew Slim Broken-In T-Shirt in White
Jeans: Mott & Bow Morton Skinny in Black
Bracelets: Billy Baker Co. Fontelina Bracelet & San Marco Bracelet
Shoes: Vans Canvas SK8-Hi Reissue in True Blue/White

XXZT

heading: PINK SUEDE BOMBER
text:
Category is: bomber and turtleneck realness! Loved the pairing of this pink suede bomber with a classic white sweater and destroyed denim, finished off with patent slippers and some standout accessories. I'm ready for the crisp fall air but still feelin' fresh!

Sunglasses: Vintage
Jacket: Topman Pink Suede Bomber Jacket
Sweater: J.Crew Turtleneck Sweater
Jeans: Abercrombie & Fitch Skinny Jeans
Watch: Brathwaite Classic Slim Wrist Watch
Bracelets: Billy Baker Co. Fontelina Bracelet & San Marco Bracelet
Shoes: Galet

XXZT

heading: SHEARLING AND SLIDES
text:
The feeling of fall is finally here, and on Halloween nonetheless! Although oftentimes I find myself eternally dressed to attend a luau (exhibits A, B, C, and D... Aloha!) I do also enjoy cozying up with layers and coats when the temps chill down. Even still, being a LA native means I can still pair sandals with this look!

Sunglasses: Ray-Ban Clubmaster in Black/Gold
Jacket: Zara Biker Jacket
Sweater: Topman Black and White Twist Turtle Neck Sweater
Jeans: Zara Slim Fit Jeans
Shoes: Adidas Adilette Slides

XXZT
